TopicTitle: There is a night club called Moon in Vegas

Articles.Content: I just got back from spending a week in Vegas and one of the clubs I went to was called Moon and the bar inside was called The Satellite Bar. They had some one dressed as Sonic wearing a space suit dancing around. Immediately thought about KSP and lack there of during my vacation :-p
Well, you know what they say:"You can take a person away from KSP, but you can't take KSP out of that person."
You must be playing too much KSP

You must be playing too much KSP

Haha, apparently so.

Vegas was a blast though. Already planning a return trip!
